Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ğd-ḥr(?), a priest(?), with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed arms in relief(only one hand remains) holding a relief hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs(much missing); there is a back-pillar(worn); the foot has broken away.
Condition: incomplete - foot missing, one side extremely worn
